Episodes.Title: The Work Outing
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Jen's new boyfriend invites Roy, Moss and Jen to a controversial theatre play, which creates a series of misunderstandings that end up having unintended consequences of epic proportions.

Episodes.Title: Return of the Golden Child
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Denholm dies and they have to go to the funeral and Roy is worried about dying.

Episodes.Title: Moss and the German
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Jen complains that Roy and Moss spend too much time together, so Moss takes a German cooking class.

Episodes.Title: The Dinner Party
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Jen has met someone normal, and plans for a nice dinner party. Things go awry when Jen invites her workmates after her original male guests cancel.

Episodes.Title: Smoke and Mirrors
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: To help Jen with her bra discomfort, Moss miraculously invents the most comfortable bra in the world, so the gang decides to patent it without fully testing the product first. Moss also invents an alter ego to promote the product.

Episodes.Title: Men Without Women
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Jen is offered a promotion but can she trust Douglas. The boys see this as an opportunity to goof off.
